title: Part 5: What is a Meaningful life? -- Helpfulness
description:
Do we have to help others to have a meaningful life? What is helping others anyway? Why should we help others or not help others? Is helping others always important? What do people turn help into? Is it selfish to help others? I discuss these questions and others in this video.  

This is episode 6 of my podcast. 

Make sure to like and subscribe!

Check out my podcast: Fining Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show: https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

--Links--
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pintrest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
